strings.Value: [Attack] "Amusing screams — and I haven't even begun yet."
[Attack] "Filthy pests! I'll purge my lands of you!"
[Leave] "I won't dirty my hands on you. Leave here at once!"
[Leave] "Fine, so be it. I'll spare your life."
[Leave] "I respect the Goddess. Praise her, for I am sparing your pathetic lives."
[Leave] "You're an amusing lot. Don't be frightened — we're friends!"
[Attack] "In Iomedae's name, I'll destroy these foul beasts!"
[Attack] "I don't believe you can ever become civilized citizens — and so there's no place for you in my barony. Abadar won't cry for you, and neither will I."

{n}Huddled behind the statue of Lamashtu, a batch of goblins cast angry glances at you, muttering threats and curses. One of them, apparently the bravest, steps out, shaking his fist, and howls at you in a quavering voice.{/n} "You n-n-not dare c-c-come closer! We catch one of your kind before, and {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu{/g} c-c-cursed him a terrible curse! She do s-s-same to you!"
"Hey!" {n}Nok-Nok pulls your sleeve.{/n} "They might be right! They be a bunch of stupid, loud, smelly and greedy worms... but if you kill them right under statue of Goddess, she might get offended!"
"Hey!" {n}The goblin tied to the pole shouts at you, struggling against his bonds. {/n}"Don't listen to them, you don't need them! Let them run! Come here, I tell you something! Something important!"
{n}He points his finger at the corpse of goblin you killed.{/n} "See how Goddess punishes the blashfeems? You run now, or she get you, too!"
"They now want mercy. When prisoners begged them — they listened?"
"You must now make a choice between justice and mercy. Don't fear the wrath of an evil goddess — it's not her who will judge you for this choice. This will stay between your soul and your own deity."
"Ha! Yeah, now I'm scared! What will {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu{/g} do? Send another owlbear for us to skin?"
"Ha-ha, these pests are funny. Let's fry them!"
"What are you waiting for? Kill these miscreants, and let's move on. I'm fed up with this garbage heap."
"Great! Pray to your goddess, you little rats! She can't help you anyway, ha ha ha ha!"
"Aaah! {g|Lamashtu}Goddess{/g}, let us sacrifice 'em to you!"
"{g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu{/g} or not, you will be responsible for anyone these vermin kill or maim. Do not press your luck — cleanse your lands of these monsters."
"I would have said it differently, but our thoughts were essentially the same." {n}A caustic smile touches Valerie's lips.{/n}
